lead_paragraph: Caroll Spinney has been Sesame Street's Big Bird and Oscar the Grouch since 1969, and at 78 years old, he has no intention of stopping. Here, we peel away the instances in Caroll's life that inspired his creation of characters that influenced generations of kids.
